Text: RE Tuesday Board Meeting Cc Dear all As we informed you last week Mr Jos M Hernndez Beneyto wont be able to attend this teleconference due to the coincidence with another prearranged meeting Best regards Virginia Redondo Secretary of Mr Hernndez Original Message From SMTP Sent September To Cc Subject Tuesday Board Meeting We have not been able to secure video conference facilities for the Board meeting on Tuesday Sept We will proceed with a teleconference The information to connect to the call is as follows International Number is US Domestic Number is Participants Code is The meeting will be more effective if we can gather several Board members in locations in New York and London We will host the New York session at our offices at Fifth Avenue entrance on th Street th floor The London session will be at our offices at One New Change EC Please proceed to the Allen Overy reception desk at that location and you will be directed to a conference room The meeting will begin promptly at am New York time pm London time Based on responses we expect to have several more Board members on the phone than are necessary to satisfy quorum requirements but we do need you to join us from the beginning of the call If you are joining us in person please arrive at the New York or London location in advance of the start of the call If you are connecting by phone please do so a few minutes prior to the start of the call Our Board members in Asia and Australia are starting this call at pm pm or pm depending on their location We will make every effort to keep the meeting to an hour and a half We will consider the following issues from the original September agenda Filling of the vacancy created by Damians resignation Membership applications Mary will send a separate email with details on each application Relationship with FpML Market convergence issues An abbreviated review of the threeyear plan If you need the materials for any of these matters please contact Cynthia Richards or me I look forward to speaking with you on Tuesday Bob

RE Upcoming Board Meeting Cc Dear Bob At this moment in time I am able to make it for NY Regards Jos M Hernndez Beneyto Santander Central Hispano P de la Castellana Madrid Tel Fax Email Original Message From SMTP Sent October To Cc Subject Upcoming Board Meeting Our board meeting is scheduled for Tuesday November in New York It is our annual budget meeting so it is an important meeting I am aware however that some firms have instituted temporary bans or limitations on travel It would be helpful to know for planning purposes whether you will be able to make it to New York for the meeting George James is hosting the meeting here at the Morgan Stanley offices Bob

RE Member ApplicationsNo knowledge on and Rest is OK this end Regards Jos M Hernndez Original Message From SMTP Sent October To Cc Subject Member Applications The following applications will go for approval at the next executive committee meeting on Thursday November Please let me know if you know Kommunalbanken AS or KommunKredit Thank you Mary Primary Regional Hamburger Sparkasse German bank Associate Broker Tradition North America Inc broker Associate LIFFE exchange Arendt Medernach Luxembourg law firm Wistrand Advokatbyra Swedish law firm Associate Emerging Deacons Hong Kong law firm Subscriber Kommunalbanken AS local govt Norway funding agency KommunKredit provides loans to the Danish local authorities and Danish semimunicipal institutions CDC IXIS Asset Management its parent CDC IXIS Capital Markets is a Primary member DKR Capital Inc Investment management firm Formerly known as AIG International Asset Management Inc DKR is no longer an affiliate of AIG Bank of England Central bank Swiss National Bank Central bank
